description: PerfectTed is a UK-based food and beverage company specializing in matcha green tea products. They produce Europe's first matcha-powered canned energy drinks and ceremonial grade matcha powder. Their products are made with 100% natural ingredients, with no additives, preservatives, or added sugar, offering a healthier alternative to traditional energy drinks.
key_products_services: Matcha Energy Drinks (Pineapple Yuzu, Apple Raspberry, Pear Ginger, Juicy Peach)
business_model: PerfectTed operates a dual business model, selling both ready-to-drink matcha energy beverages through retail and wholesale channels, and matcha powder products. The matcha powder business is highly profitable and helps fund the drinks activities. They sell through major retailers, foodservice partners, and direct-to-consumer channels.
target_customer: Health-conscious consumers seeking natural energy alternatives, particularly those looking to avoid the negative effects of traditional caffeine sources like coffee and mainstream energy drinks. They specifically appeal to those with ADHD and anxiety who benefit from matcha's smoother energy curve.
mission_statement: To spread positive energy through matcha so people can feel their best, transforming the energy industry with delicious drinks using simple, 100% natural ingredients.
